name: A duck on wheels
description:
A Duck on wheels is my entry for the first round of the GDKO for 2023.

It came about after my spending week not being able come up with an idea for the jam and then deciding to just see what I could make from stock images of ducks.

Controls

Left Arrow - Move left

Right Arrow - Move right

Space - Jump

Up Arrow - Interact

Credits: Images

This game was constructed using stock images from the following creators:

Anthony : )
